text: John Lee Tuttle Jr. (1951/1952 â€“ January 28, 2022) was an American Democratic politician. He was born in Sanford, Maine. He was a member of the Maine House of Representatives between 1978 until 1984, 1994 until 2002 and again from 2004 until 2012. He was a member of the Maine Senate from 2012 until 2014. Tuttle died on January 28, 2022 in Sanford, at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Maine
title: John Tuttle (politician)
